title: Speacial dua in Ramadan
transcript: is there a special supplication for the first 10 days of Ramadan and the second 10 days and the last 10 days of Ramadan the answer is no all what is in this topic is a fabrication or a very very weak hadith that does not reach the level of authenticity so that we cannot say the Prophet said this our son no the Prophet did not say it and allah azzawajal knows best
